languages.text: "Подтверждаю информацию, касающуюся надлежащего обращения к духам машин в данном секторе. {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}Сервиторы{/g} свидетельствуют, что данные простолюдины исполняют таинства, которые им разрешено знать".

traits.locale_text: "Подтверждаю информацию, касающуюся надлежащего обращения к духам машин в данном секторе. {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}Сервиторы{/g} свидетельствуют, что данные простолюдины исполняют таинства, которые им разрешено знать".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "I confirm the information regarding the proper tending of the machine spirits in this sector. {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}Servitors{/g} indicate that these commoners are performing the sacraments they are permitted to know."
languages.original_text: "Подтверждаю информацию, касающуюся надлежащего обращения к духам машин в данном секторе. {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}Сервиторы{/g} свидетельствуют, что данные простолюдины исполняют таинства, которые им разрешено знать".

languages.text: “我已经确认了，这里的船员确实在以适宜的方式照顾这片区域的机魂。{g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}机仆{/g}表示，这些平民举行的圣礼在他们允许了解的范围之内。”
languages.original_text: "I confirm the information regarding the proper tending of the machine spirits in this sector. {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}Servitors{/g} indicate that these commoners are performing the sacraments they are permitted to know."

traits.locale_text: “我已经确认了，这里的船员确实在以适宜的方式照顾这片区域的机魂。{g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}奴工{/g}表示，这些平民举行的圣礼在他们允许了解的范围之内。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Confirmo la información relativa al trato adecuado de los espíritus máquina en este sector. Los {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servidores{/g} indican que estos plebeyos están realizando los sacramentos que tienen permitido conocer».
languages.original_text: "I confirm the information regarding the proper tending of the machine spirits in this sector. {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}Servitors{/g} indicate that these commoners are performing the sacraments they are permitted to know."

traits.locale_text: «Confirmo la información relativa al trato adecuado de los espíritus máquina en este sector. Los {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servidores{/g} indican que estos plebeyos están realizando los sacramentos que tienen permitido conocer».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「このセクターの機械精霊の適切な世話に関する情報を確認する。{g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}サーヴィター{/g}たちは、これらの一般市民が知ることを許された秘跡を行っていることを示している」
languages.original_text: "I confirm the information regarding the proper tending of the machine spirits in this sector. {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}Servitors{/g} indicate that these commoners are performing the sacraments they are permitted to know."

traits.locale_text: 「このセクターの機械精霊の適切な世話に関する情報を確認する。{g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}サーヴィター{/g}たちは、これらの一般市民が知ることを許された秘跡を行っていることを示している」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Ich bestätige die Informationen bezüglich des korrekten Umgangs mit den Maschinengeistern in diesem Sektor. Die {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}Servitoren{/g} deuten darauf hin, dass diese Bürger die Sakramente ausführen, die ihnen zu kennen gestattet ist."
languages.original_text: "I confirm the information regarding the proper tending of the machine spirits in this sector. {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}Servitors{/g} indicate that these commoners are performing the sacraments they are permitted to know."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bestätige die Informationen bezüglich des korrekten Umgangs mit den Maschinengeistern in diesem Sektor. Die {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}Servitoren{/g} deuten darauf hin, dass diese Bürger die Sakramente ausführen, die ihnen zu kennen gestattet ist."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Je confirme que les esprits de la machine de ce secteur sont traités avec tous les égards qui leur sont dus. Les {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitors{/g} indiquent que ces gens respectent les sacrements qu'ils sont habilités à pratiquer. »
languages.original_text: "I confirm the information regarding the proper tending of the machine spirits in this sector. {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}Servitors{/g} indicate that these commoners are performing the sacraments they are permitted to know."

traits.locale_text: « Je confirme que les esprits de la machine de ce secteur sont traités avec tous les égards qui leur sont dus. Les {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitors{/g} indiquent que ces gens respectent les sacrements qu'ils sont habilités à pratiquer. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Bu sektördeki makine ruhlarıyla ilgili verilen bilgiyi tasdik edebilirim. {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}Hizmetörler{/g}, bu kimselerin müsaade edilen ibadetleri gerçekleştirdiklerine işaret ediyor."
languages.original_text: "I confirm the information regarding the proper tending of the machine spirits in this sector. {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}Servitors{/g} indicate that these commoners are performing the sacraments they are permitted to know."

traits.locale_text: "Bu sektördeki makine ruhlarıyla ilgili verilen bilgiyi tasdik edebilirim. {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}Servitörler{/g}, bu kişilerin müsaade edilen ibadetleri yaptıklarına işaret ediyor."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
